chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params

Goal:
forall (net : network) (st' : Net.name -> data) (ps' xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (d : data) (ms : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> no_entries_past_current_term net -> (forall h : Net.name, st' h = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d h) -> (forall p' : packet, In p' ps' -> In p' (xs ++ ys) \/ In p' (send_packets (pDst p) ms)) -> currentTerm (nwState net (pDst p)) <= currentTerm d -> log d = log (nwState net (pDst p)) -> (forall m : Net.name * Net.msg, In m ms -> ~ is_append_entries (snd m)) -> no_entries_past_current_term {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}

Premises:
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
pDst = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (p : packet) => let (_, pDst, _) := p in pDst : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), packet -> Net.name Arguments pDst {P params}
snd = fun (A B : Type) (p : A * B) => let (_, y) := p in y : forall A B : Type, A * B -> B Arguments snd {A B}%type_scope
Inductive msg (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := RequestVote : term -> name -> logIndex -> term -> msg | RequestVoteReply : term -> bool -> msg | AppendEntries : term -> name -> logIndex -> term -> list entry -> logIndex -> msg | AppendEntriesReply : term -> list entry -> bool -> msg Arguments msg {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments RequestVote {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments RequestVoteReply {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%bool_scope Arguments AppendEntries {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ _ _ _%list_scope Arguments AppendEntriesReply {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%list_scope _%bool_scope
Record packet (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkPacket { pSrc : Net.name; pDst : Net.name; pBody : Net.msg } Arguments packet {P params} Arguments mkPacket {P params}
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
Notation currentTerm := (RaftState.currentTerm term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output)
data = fun BaseParams0 : BaseParams => let (data, _, _) := BaseParams0 in data : BaseParams -> Type Arguments data {BaseParams}
Record BaseParams : Type := Build_BaseParams { data : Type; input : Type; output : Type } Arguments Build_BaseParams (_ _ _)%type_scope
no_entries_past_current_term = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => no_entries_past_current_term_host net /\ no_entries_past_current_term_nw net : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments no_entries_past_current_term {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
nwPackets = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (n : network) => let (nwPackets, _) := n in nwPackets : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), network -> list packet Arguments nwPackets {P params}
nwState = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (n : network) => let (_, nwState) := n in nwState : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), network -> Net.name -> data Arguments nwState {P params}
Record network (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkNetwork { nwPackets : list packet; nwState : Net.name -> data } Arguments network {P params} Arguments mkNetwork {P params} _%list_scope _%function_scope
name = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fin N : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments name {orig_base_params raft_params}
send_packets = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (src : Net.name) (ps : list (Net.name * Net.msg)) => map (fun m : Net.name * Net.msg => {| pSrc := src; pDst := fst m; pBody := snd m |}) ps : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), Net.name -> list (Net.name * Net.msg) -> list packet Arguments send_packets {P params} _ _%list_scope /
update : (forall x y : ?A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> (?A -> ?B) -> ?A -> ?B -> ?A -> ?B where ?A : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params |- Type] ?B : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params |- Type]
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
Notation log := (RaftState.log term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output)
name_eq_dec : forall x y : name, {x = y} + {x <> y}
RIR_handleMessage : forall (p : packet) (net : network) (xs ys : list packet) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> handleMessage (pSrc p) (pDst p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (d, l) -> nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> (forall h : name, st' h = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d h) -> (forall p' : packet, In p' ps' -> In p' (xs ++ ys) \/ In p' (send_packets (pDst p) l)) -> raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}
raft_invariant_handle_message : forall (P : network -> Prop) (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), raft_net_invariant_append_entries P -> raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply P -> raft_net_invariant_request_vote P -> raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply P -> handleMessage (pSrc p) (pDst p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (d, l) -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> (forall h : name, st' h = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d h) ->...-> P {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}
raft_intermediate_reachable_sind : forall P : network -> SProp, P step_async_init -> (forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> P net') ->...-> P n
raft_intermediate_reachable_ind : forall P : network -> Prop, P step_async_init -> (forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> P net') ->...-> P n
raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (m : list (name * msg)) (t : nat) (es : list entry) (res : bool), handleAppendEntriesReply (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) (pSrc p) t es res = (d, m) -> pBody p = AppendEntriesReply t es res -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
raft_net_invariant_request_vote = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (m : msg) (t : nat) (cid : name) (lli llt : nat), handleRequestVote (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) t (pSrc p) lli llt = (d, m) -> pBody p = RequestVote t cid lli llt -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_request_vote {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Inductive raft_intermediate_reachable (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : network -> Prop := RIR_init : raft_intermediate_reachable step_async_init | RIR_step_failure : forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> raft_intermediate_reachable net' | RIR_handleInput : forall (net : network) (h : name) (inp : raft_input) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (ps' : list packet) (st' : name -> data), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> handleInput h inp (nwState net h) = (out...
raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (t : nat) (v : bool), handleRequestVoteReply (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) (pSrc p) t v = d -> pBody p = RequestVoteReply t v -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> (forall h : name, st' h = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d h) ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
raft_net_invariant_append_entries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (m : msg) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex), handleAppendEntries (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) t n pli plt es ci = (d, m) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_append_entries {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
no_entries_past_current_term_append_entries = fun (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (m : msg) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (H : handleAppendEntries (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) t n pli plt es ci = (d, m)) (H0 : pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci) (H1 : no_entries_past_current_term_host net /\ no_entries_past_current_term_nw net) (_ : raft_intermediate_reachable net) (H3 : nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys) (H4 : forall h : name, st' h = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (p...
no_entries_past_current_term_timeout = fun (net : network) (h : name) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (H : handleTimeout h (nwState net h) = (out, d, l)) (H0 : no_entries_past_current_term_host net /\ no_entries_past_current_term_nw net) (_ : raft_intermediate_reachable net) (H2 : forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d h') (H3 : forall p' : packet, In p' ps' -> In p' (nwPackets net) \/ In p' (send_packets h l)) => let H4 : log d = log (nwState net h) /\ currentTerm (nwState net h) <= currentTerm d /\ (forall m : name * msg, In m l -> ~ is...
step_failure_sind : forall P : list Net.name * network -> list Net.name * network -> list (Net.name * (input + list output)) -> SProp, (forall (net net' : network) (failed : list Net.name) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> ~ In (pDst p) failed -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update Net.name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P (failed, net) (failed, net') [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P p p0 l
step_failure_ind : forall P : list Net.name * network -> list Net.name * network -> list (Net.name * (input + list output)) -> Prop, (forall (net net' : network) (failed : list Net.name) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> ~ In (pDst p) failed -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update Net.name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P (failed, net) (failed, net') [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P p p0 l
no_entries_past_current_term_do_generic_server = fun (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (os : list raft_output) (d' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)) (h : name) (H : doGenericServer h d = (os, d', ms)) (H0 : no_entries_past_current_term_host net /\ no_entries_past_current_term_nw net) (_ : raft_intermediate_reachable net) (H2 : nwState net h = d) (H3 : forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d' h') (H4 : forall p : packet, In p ps' -> In p (nwPackets net) \/ In p (send_packets h ms)) => let H5 : log d' = log d /\ currentTerm d' = currentTerm d /\ (forall m : name * msg, In...
step_dup_sind : forall P : network -> network -> list (Net.name * (input + list output)) -> SProp, (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update Net.name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P n n0 l
step_dup_ind : forall P : network -> network -> list (Net.name * (input + list output)) -> Prop, (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update Net.name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P n n0 l
step_drop_ind : forall P : network -> network -> list (Net.name * (input + list output)) -> Prop, (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update Net.name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P n n0 l
step_drop_sind : forall P : network -> network -> list (Net.name * (input + list output)) -> SProp, (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update Net.name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P n n0 l
StepFailure_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (failed : list Net.name) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> ~ In (pDst p) failed -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update Net.name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed, net') [(pDst p, inr out)]
step_async_ind : forall P : network -> network -> list (Net.name * (input + list output)) -> Prop, (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update Net.name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P n n0 l
step_async_sind : forall P : network -> network -> list (Net.name * (input + list output)) -> SProp, (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update Net.name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P n n0 l
Inductive step_failure (P0 : BaseParams) (P : MultiParams P0) (params : FailureParams P) : step_relation (list Net.name * network) (Net.name * (input + list output)) := StepFailure_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (failed : list Net.name) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> ~ In (pDst p) failed -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update Net.name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed, net...
raft_invariant_handle_input : forall (P : network -> Prop) (h : name) (inp : raft_input) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), raft_net_invariant_timeout P -> raft_net_invariant_client_request P -> handleInput h inp (nwState net h) = (out, d, l) -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d h') -> (forall p' : packet, In p' ps' -> In p' (nwPackets net) \/ In p' (send_packets h l)) -> P {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}
raft_net_invariant_timeout = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (net : network) (h : name) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), handleTimeout h (nwState net h) = (out, d, l) -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d h') -> (forall p' : packet, In p' ps' -> In p' (nwPackets net) \/ In p' (send_packets h l)) ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_timeout {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
RIR_handleInput : forall (net : network) (h : name) (inp : raft_input) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (ps' : list packet) (st' : name -> data), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> handleInput h inp (nwState net h) = (out, d, l) -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d h') -> (forall p' : packet, In p' ps' -> In p' (nwPackets net) \/ In p' (send_packets h l)) -> raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}
Inductive step_dup (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : step_relation network (Net.name * (input + list output)) := StepDup_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys ->...-> step_dup net net' [] Arguments step_dup {P params} Arguments StepDup_deliver {P params} _ [net'] _ (_ _)%list_scope [out]%list_scope [d] [l]%list_scope Arguments StepDup_input {P params} [h] _ [net'] [out]%list_scope _ [d] [l]%list_scope Arguments StepDup_dup {P params} _ [net' p] (_ _)%list_scope
raft_net_invariant_client_request = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (h : name) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input), handleClientRequest h (nwState net h) client id c = (out, d, l) -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d h') ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_client_request {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Inductive step_drop (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : step_relation network (Net.name * (input + list output)) := StepDrop_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys ->...-> step_drop net net' [(h, inl inp); (h, inr out)] Arguments step_drop {P params} Arguments StepDrop_deliver {P params} _ [net'] _ (_ _)%list_scope [out]%list_scope [d] [l]%list_scope Arguments StepDrop_drop {P params} _ [net'] _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments StepDrop_input {P params} [h] _ [net'] [out]%list_scope _ [d] [l]%list_scope
no_entries_past_current_term_nw_no_append_entries : forall (net : network) (ps' : list packet) (h : Net.name) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)) (st' : Net.name -> data), no_entries_past_current_term_nw net -> (forall p : packet, In p ps' -> In p (nwPackets net) \/ In p (send_packets h l)) -> (forall m : Net.name * Net.msg, In m l -> ~ is_append_entries (snd m)) -> no_entries_past_current_term_nw {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}
StepDup_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update Net.name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> step_dup net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]
StepDrop_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update Net.name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> step_drop net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]
StepAsync_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update Net.name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> step_async net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]
Inductive step_async (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : step_relation network (Net.name * (input + list output)) := StepAsync_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) ->...-> step_async net net' [(h, inl inp); (h, inr out)] Arguments step_async {P params} Arguments StepAsync_deliver {P params} _ [net'] _ (_ _)%list_scope [out]%list_scope [d] [l]%list_scope Arguments StepAsync_input {P params} [h] _ [net'] [out]%list_scope _ [d] [l]%list_scope
raft_net_invariant_do_generic_server = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (os : list raft_output) (d' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)) (h : name), doGenericServer h d = (os, d', ms) -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> nwState net h = d -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d' h') -> (forall p : packet, In p ps' -> In p (nwPackets net) \/ In p (send_packets h ms)) ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_do_generic_server {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
raft_net_invariant_do_leader = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (h : name) (os : list raft_output) (d' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), doLeader d h = (os, d', ms) -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> nwState net h = d -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d' h') -> (forall p : packet, In p ps' -> In p (nwPackets net) \/ In p (send_packets h ms)) ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_do_leader {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
RIR_doGenericServer : forall (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (os : list raft_output) (d' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)) (h : name), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> doGenericServer h (nwState net h) = (os, d', ms) -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d' h') -> (forall p : packet, In p ps' -> In p (nwPackets net) \/ In p (send_packets h ms)) -> raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}
RIR_doLeader : forall (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (h : Net.name) (os : list raft_output) (d' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> doLeader (nwState net h) h = (os, d', ms) -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d' h') -> (forall p : packet, In p ps' -> In p (nwPackets net) \/ In p (send_packets h ms)) -> raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}
no_entries_past_current_term_client_request = fun (h : name) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input) (H : handleClientRequest h (nwState net h) client id c = (out, d, l)) (H0 : no_entries_past_current_term_host net /\ no_entries_past_current_term_nw net) (_ : raft_intermediate_reachable net) (H2 : forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d h') (H3 : forall p' : packet, In p' ps' -> In p' (nwPackets net) \/ In p' (send_packets h l)) => and_ind (fun (H4 : no_entries_past_current_term_host net) (H5 : no_entries...
handleTimeout_spec : forall (h : name) (d : raft_data) (os : list raft_output) (d' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), handleTimeout h d = (os, d', ms) -> log d' = log d /\ currentTerm d <= currentTerm d' /\ (forall m : name * msg, In m ms -> ~ is_append_entries (snd m))
step_ordered_failure_sind : forall P : list Net.name * ordered_network -> list Net.name * ordered_network -> list (Net.name * (input + output)) ->...-> P p p0 l where ?P : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?fail_msg_params : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]
